name: Relais 6

reviews.text: Hotel Relais 6 is a very good hotel. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are very good, and are very clean. Also the breakfast is very good. When we should come back to Rom we would stay again in this hotel. It is a good place to stay.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: We visited Relais 6 with the whole family. Staff was very helpful and understanding (we came with a one-year old baby). to give an example: upon arrival we were offered a baby cot free of charge (we did not order it). The rooms are simple but very clean. The atmosphere of the hotel is calm and relaxed. The breakfast was very good and surprisingly rich (not your usual Italian bread with marmelate).
reviews.title: a really nice treat

reviews.text: We really enjoyed the neighbourhood - ok, you have to take a bus to get to the very centre, but if you like walking it is a good option as well. And honestly, after the whole day spent in a busy downtown, you can enjoy your quiet evening on the roof terrace with a glass of wine and some tapas...
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel...

reviews.text: Well, we know now that this is our place to stay in Rome .
reviews.title: Excellent hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at Relais 6 for the 2nd time this year. Very nice rooms and friendly staff make you feel at home. The hotel is located in north of the center of Rome in a quite residential area. I'll certainly come back...
reviews.title: Attention to detail is exceptional!

reviews.text: We booked this mainly on the price and the fact we needed a family room and we were expecting more of a family run guest house/b&b. However this turned out to be a very slick well run smart boutique hotel. Staff were friendly and helpful, but not overly so. Rooms were large with a separate living area, bathroom and large walk in wardrobe (we stayed in an apartment room), good breakfast although a little samey after a few days. Most of all we enjoyed the lounge area, a really nice place to relax at the end of the day with lots of drinks to choose from and free nibbles/sandwiches included with each drink bought. Our main concern was the distance from the centre, we didn't try the buses but it was only a short 10 minutes walk to the nearest tube (with two small kids in tow) so you could be in central Rome in no time at all. Would definitely stay here again, exceptional value and one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in!
reviews.title: Best city hotel I've stayed in!

reviews.text: Location is somewhat less than central, in a quiet residential area. Beautiful house with interesting 1920's features and rooftop terrace. Breakfast is clearly above usual Italian level however far from British or US standards. Helpful staff. The museum in the basement was not accessible for hotel guests, contrary to what they say on their website.

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.text: Waiting time for the bus can be long, so take a taxi, the price difference with the hotels of the same quality in the tourist areas is enough to pay for several taxi journeys.

reviews.title: Stylish Clean & Friendly
reviews.text: I recently returned from a 12 day trip to Italy with my two daughters in their 20's. We spent 4 nights at this hotel and it was definitely the best hotel we stayed at during our trip. As others have said, the hotel is outside the city center, but I found that to be a plus. It was nice to get away from the crowds. There was a great selection of items at breakfast. Lots of fruit and pastries and the service was really good. Every evening, they had drinks and snacks available in their lounge. It was a pleasant way to unwind after a long day touring the city. The weather wasn't the greatest while we were there so I didn't get much of a chance to sit out on the terrace. But there was also a nice indoor sitting area near the work out facility.

description: Relais 6 is a refined and exclusive Hotel located in one of elegant area in Rome. The rooms also interconnecting, the suites and apartments with two rooms meet the needs of all customers. An ideal combination for journeys to the Eternal City and business travel. Each room has been designed and equipped with all facilities at the highest levels of quality and comfort.
